original: de lta na ni rgyud gzhan med pa'i phyir rig byed mtha' ba'i grub mthar lhung bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de lta na ni rgyud gzhan med pa'i phyir rig byed mtha' ba'i grub mthar lhung bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: In that case, because there would be no other mindstreams, you would fall into the extreme of the Vedānta.

original: mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i dang snying rje chen po'i dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi spyod yul cung zad kyang med par yang ngo //
analyzed: mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i dang snying rje chen po'i dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi spyod yul cung zad kyang med par yang ngo //
translated: And there would be no opportunity for the slightest activity of the perfections, such as generosity, confession of misdeeds, and so on, and great compassion.

original: gang @122b 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu ye shes sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'gro ba rgyud gcig gi nang du chud na yang /
analyzed: gang @122b 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu ye shes sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'gro ba rgyud gcig gi nang du chud na yang /
translated: If some sentient beings and some buddhas and bodhisattvas are included in the same mindstream,

original: slar yang spro ba gsungs pa de ni ches shin tu 'gal te /
analyzed: slar yang spro ba gsungs pa de ni ches shin tu 'gal te /
translated: then it is very contradictory to say that they emanate again.

original: sems can rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyun re re ba'o zhes pa'i grub mtha'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyun re re ba'o zhes pa'i grub mtha'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the tenet that sentient beings are the continuum of a single consciousness.

original: cig car rtog pa med pa'i shes pa du ma skye ba la ni /
analyzed: cig car rtog pa med pa'i shes pa du ma skye ba la ni /
translated: With regard to the arising of many consciousnesses that do not conceive simultaneously,

original: rnam par dbye ba med par 'jug cing bya ba gcig byed pa rnams la gcig tu mos pa kho na'i gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i rdul phra rab 'dus pa la bum par mos pa bzhin no zhes pas sems can gcig tu tha snyad bya ba🔽kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med par 'jug cing bya ba gcig byed pa rnams la gcig tu mos pa kho na'i gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i rdul phra rab 'dus pa la bum par mos pa bzhin no zhes pas sems can gcig tu tha snyad bya ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: Thus, they are only devoted to a single sentient being.

original: gal te rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud dag gcig pa nyid dngos po pa brjod par 'dod na 'gal bar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: gal te rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud dag gcig pa nyid dngos po pa brjod par 'dod na 'gal bar 'gyur mod /
translated: If you assert that the continuum of self and other is a single thing, then that would be contradictory.

original: de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is the case?

original: lhag par mos pa pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa pa'o //
translated: They are devoted to something superior.

original: gcig nyid du lhag par mos pa yang thog mar goms pa dang ldan pa kho na'i sgrib pa med pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i sems dpa' de'i bdag nyid du lhag par mos pa ni /
analyzed: gcig nyid du lhag par mos pa yang thog mar goms pa dang ldan pa kho na'i sgrib pa med pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i sems dpa' de'i bdag nyid du lhag par mos pa ni /
translated: Those who are devoted to singularity are only those who are initially familiar with the bodhicitta that is the nature of the utterly pure bodhisattvas who are free of obscurations. They are devoted to that as their own nature.

original: brtan par gus pa dang bcas shing rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas so so skye bo'i nga rgyal bsal la nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa nye bar byed do //🔽de skad du yang /
analyzed: brtan par gus pa dang bcas shing rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas so so skye bo'i nga rgyal bsal la nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa nye bar byed do // de skad du yang /
translated: Since one engages in the yoga of the creation stage with stable devotion and without interruption, one dispels the pride of being an ordinary person and then brings about the supramundane purity.

original: dpal de kho na nyid 'dus par /
analyzed: dpal de kho na nyid 'dus par /
translated: Thus, it says in the glorious Compendium of Reality:

original: rnam pa lnga mngon par byang chub par gyur pa na /
analyzed: rnam pa lnga mngon par byang chub par gyur pa na /
translated: “When one has become manifest enlightenment in five aspects,

original: aom ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yin pa de ltar nga'o zhes pa'i rjes thogs su gsungs pa /
analyzed: aom ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yin pa de ltar nga'o zhes pa'i rjes thogs su gsungs pa /
translated: after the statement ‘just as I am all tathāgatas, so too am I,’

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas /
translated: then the great bodhisattva Vajradhātvīśvara, having manifestly and completely enlightened himself in the body of a tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: having bowed to those tathāgatas, said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig / mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzad du gsol zhes so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig / mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzad du gsol zhes so //
translated: Please stabilize this manifest enlightenment!

original: de nas de skad gsol pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje la rab tu zhugs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nas de skad gsol pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje la rab tu zhugs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Then, when this was requested, all tathāgatas entered the vajra of the sattva of the tathāgata realm.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings /
translated: Then, the bhagavat tathāgata vajra realm,

original: skad cig de kho na @123a * //
analyzed: skad cig de kho na @123a * //
translated: in that very instant,

original: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: fully awakened to the wisdom of the sameness of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs so //
translated: He entered the secret pledge of the seal of the wisdom of the sameness of all tathāgatas' vajras.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go //
translated: He realized the wisdom of the sameness of all tathāgatas' dharmas, which is pure by nature.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur to //
translated: The source of the pristine consciousness of the natural luminosity of the sameness of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur ro zhes so //
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo la mngon par dgongs pas don du gnyer bar byed de /
analyzed: 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo la mngon par dgongs pas don du gnyer bar byed de /
translated: Here, Vajradhātu, with the intention of future beings, is desirous.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The body of the tathāgatas is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes so //
translated: The tathāgatas.

original: sems dpa'i rdo rje la ni dam tshig sems dpa' la'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i rdo rje la ni dam tshig sems dpa' la'o //
translated: The vajra of the sattva is the samaya sattva.

original: de kho na la ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs pa'i rjes thogs kyi skad cig la'o //
analyzed: de kho na la ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs pa'i rjes thogs kyi skad cig la'o //
translated: In that very moment, the moment of the gnosis sattva Vajradhara, who is the nature of the five tathāgatas, Vairocana, and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa la /
translated: All tathāgatas, and so on.

original: ye shes zhes pa'i tshig bzhin rnams kyis me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi rnams gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes zhes pa'i tshig bzhin rnams kyis me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi rnams gsungs so //
translated: The words “wisdom” indicate the four wisdoms, such as the mirror-like wisdom.

original: yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes pa 'dis lnga pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes pa 'dis lnga pa'o //
translated: The words “perfectly and completely enlightened” indicate the fifth.

original: mnyam pa nyid ces pa'i tshig rnams kyis ye shes thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ces pa'i tshig rnams kyis ye shes thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: The words “equality” indicate the equality of all wisdoms.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dang lhan cig bdag nyid brtan par gcig pa nyid du lhag par mos pa ni mnyam pa nyid du yid ches pa'i don kho na'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dang lhan cig bdag nyid brtan par gcig pa nyid du lhag par mos pa ni mnyam pa nyid du yid ches pa'i don kho na'o //
translated: Thus, the conviction of the equality of oneself with all the Tathāgatas is the very meaning of the conviction of equality.

original: de bzhin du 'gro ba yang lhan cig gcig pa nyid du lhag par mos pa ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid mtshungs pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gro ba yang lhan cig gcig pa nyid du lhag par mos pa ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid mtshungs pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ched du'o //
translated: Similarly, the conviction of the equality of oneself with all beings is for the sake of realizing the equality of the suchness that is pure by nature.

original: de ltar na yang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i gnas skabs dag la byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin kho na sna tshogs pa'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i gnas skabs dag la byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin kho na sna tshogs pa'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: Thus, in the context of the state of the result and the state of the cause, the meaning intended is that the nature of the thought of awakening is indeed diverse.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyun kho na'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ye shes sems dpa' ngo bo dang lhan cig de'i @123b bdag nyid du lhag par mos par byed cing gzhan gyi rgyud kyi ye shes sems dpa' dang mnyam pa nyid
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyun kho na'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ye shes sems dpa' ngo bo dang lhan cig de'i @123b bdag nyid du lhag par mos par byed cing gzhan gyi rgyud kyi ye shes sems dpa' dang mnyam pa nyid
translated: Therefore, the state of the result that will arise from one’s own continuum of mind is the wisdom being, and one should imagine it to be of the same nature as the essence.

original: kyis bar ma'i sems can rnams dang ngo zhes pa man ngag go //
analyzed: kyis bar ma'i sems can rnams dang ngo zhes pa man ngag go //
translated: The middle beings are equal to the wisdom being of another continuum.

original: de'i phyir dngos po par rang nyid gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dang de'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po par rang nyid gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dang de'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, one does not meditate on oneself as the nature of another’s continuum of mind.🔽Nor does one emanate that from oneself.

original: rang nyid las de 'phro ba yang ma yin no zhes pas 'gal ba cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: rang nyid las de 'phro ba yang ma yin no zhes pas 'gal ba cung zad kyang med do //
translated: Thus there is not the slightest contradiction.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should consider the others as appropriate.

original: gang yang lha mo gcig la lha mo gzhan rnams nang du 'dus nas gtso bo la bde ba chen pos mchod par byed do zhes gsungs pa de la /
analyzed: gang yang lha mo gcig la lha mo gzhan rnams nang du 'dus nas gtso bo la bde ba chen pos mchod par byed do zhes gsungs pa de la /
translated: Now, it is said that one goddess dissolves into another goddess and makes an offering of great bliss to the principal.

original: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus can thogs pa med pa de rnams kyi rgyud tha dad pa nyid na lhan cig yul gcig tu gnas pa tsam ni nang du 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus can thogs pa med pa de rnams kyi rgyud tha dad pa nyid na lhan cig yul gcig tu gnas pa tsam ni nang du 'dus pa ste /
translated: Those who have mental bodies, being unimpeded, are in different continuums.

original: phan tshun de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: They are gathered together in the sense that they merely abide together in one place, but they are not mutually of the same nature.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud las sprul pa nyid la ni de'i bdag nyid kyang mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud las sprul pa nyid la ni de'i bdag nyid kyang mi 'gal lo //
translated: In the Yoga Tantra, it is not contradictory for emanations to be of the same nature.

original: gang phyir dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gang phyir dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The deities of the mandala are of two kinds.

original: kha cig tu phal cher rgyud tha dad pa'i tshul te /
analyzed: kha cig tu phal cher rgyud tha dad pa'i tshul te /
translated: In some cases, they are mostly of different continuums.

original: dper na dpal de kho na nyid 'dus par rgyas par bstan pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du lha rnams bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na dpal de kho na nyid 'dus par rgyas par bstan pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du lha rnams bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the mandala of Subjugation of Maras, which is taught extensively in the Shri Paramita-samuchaya, the deities are of different continuums.

original: kha cig tu phal cher rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la sprul pa ste /
analyzed: kha cig tu phal cher rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la sprul pa ste /
translated: In some cases, they are mostly emanations of the Yoga Tantra.

original: dper na dpal 'dus pa dang bde mchog dang kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na dpal 'dus pa dang bde mchog dang kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhin no zhes pa'o //
translated: For example, the deities of the Shri Guhyasamaja, Shri Chakrasamvara, and Shri Hevajra mandalas are emanations of the Yoga Tantra.

original: dbang po lhag par rno ba'i sems can rnams la ni su zhig dang yang de'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa med de /
analyzed: dbang po lhag par rno ba'i sems can rnams la ni su zhig dang yang de'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa med de /
translated: For those sentient beings with superior faculties, there is no cultivation of the deity in union with anyone.

original: gang phyir de ni yud kyis rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku kho nar 'ba' zhig pa'am dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa yang rung /
analyzed: gang phyir de ni yud kyis rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku kho nar 'ba' zhig pa'am dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa yang rung /
translated: Because in an instant, they cultivate themselves as only the form of the perfect Vajradhara or as the maṇḍala and retinue,

original: shes rab dang bcas pa'am shes rab med par bdag nyid goms par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab dang bcas pa'am shes rab med par bdag nyid goms par byed do //
translated: either with wisdom or without wisdom.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la byang chub sems kyi rang gi ngo bor nges pa nyid du goms par byed cing 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la byang chub sems kyi rang gi ngo bor nges pa nyid du goms par byed cing 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: That is, they cultivate the Bhagavān Vajrasattva as the nature of bodhicitta, thinking,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo 'di kho na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rig ma la sogs pa'i rnam pas kun rdzob @124a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo 'di kho na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rig ma la sogs pa'i rnam pas kun rdzob @124a * //
translated: “The Bhagavān Bodhicittavajra, the nature of the gnosis of wisdom and method, is the five tathāgatas, such as Rāgavajrī, and so on, in the aspect of the knowledge consorts, and so on, who assume the form of the conventional

original: pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa ni /
translated: truth.

original: nyon mongs pas yongs su gos pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi sems dri ma med par byed pa'i don du /
analyzed: nyon mongs pas yongs su gos pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi sems dri ma med par byed pa'i don du /
translated: For the sake of purifying the minds of the realms of sentient beings, which are completely covered by the afflictions,

original: de ltar gyur pa'i lam la 'jug pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa'i gdul bya de rnams de kho na nyid la sbyor bar mdzad cing 'di ltar rnam par gnas pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i lam la 'jug pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa'i gdul bya de rnams de kho na nyid la sbyor bar mdzad cing 'di ltar rnam par gnas pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: those disciples who are fortunate to enter the path that has become like that are joined to reality, and it is thus that it abides.

original: 'di lta bu kho na yang man ngag go //🔽'di ltar yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar chos rnams thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu kho na yang man ngag go // 'di ltar yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar chos rnams thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This is the instruction.🔽In this way, just like Vajrasattva and so on, all phenomena are also to be realized through the instruction of the guru as being devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs nas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs nas /
translated: Therefore, with this process, by meditating on Vajrasattva and so on, one will realize that all phenomena are devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ched du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ched du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nye bar bstan to //
translated: The Blessed Ones have taught that this is for the sake of the Great Seal, the accomplishment of the meditation on Vajrasattva and so on.

original: 'di kho na la mngon par dgongs nas gdul bya rnams kyi sems kyi 'jug pa rjes su gzhug pa'i ched du dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rgyud chen por gsungs pa /🔽'dir ni bdag gi gsang ba yi //
analyzed: 'di kho na la mngon par dgongs nas gdul bya rnams kyi sems kyi 'jug pa rjes su gzhug pa'i ched du dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rgyud chen por gsungs pa / 'dir ni bdag gi gsang ba yi //
translated: With just this in mind, in order to introduce the mental engagement of disciples, it is said in the Great Tantra of the Reality of Commitment:🔽Here, abiding in the essence

original: snying po kun bsdus la gnas nas //
analyzed: snying po kun bsdus la gnas nas //
translated: of the secret of the self,

original: rdo rje lha mo kun 'dus dang / gar kun gyis ni gar mdzad do //
analyzed: rdo rje lha mo kun 'dus dang / gar kun gyis ni gar mdzad do //
translated: the vajra goddess gathers all and dances with all dances.

original: zhes so // 'di la shin tu mang zhing legs par bshad par nus te /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di la shin tu mang zhing legs par bshad par nus te /
translated: Here, it is possible to explain this in great detail,

original: gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma brjod do //
analyzed: gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma brjod do //
translated: but fearing too many words, I will not write more.

original: dbang bskur ba ni ye shes kyi chu rnams kyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi dri ma 'khrud pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni ye shes kyi chu rnams kyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi dri ma 'khrud pa'o //
translated: The initiation is the washing of the stains of all obscurations along with their habitual tendencies with the water of pristine awareness.

original: de'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i khu bas spyi bor gnas pas rgyas gdab par rigs kyi dbye bas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i khu bas spyi bor gnas pas rgyas gdab par rigs kyi dbye bas 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the consecration is by the consecration-fluid located on the head, and it is of the nature of the family.

original: de ltar yang gus par byed pa'i tshul du gang spyi bor bsgom pa de ni rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang gus par byed pa'i tshul du gang spyi bor bsgom pa de ni rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: And thus, the consecration is that which is meditated on the head in the manner of reverence.

original: 'di rnams ni rang gi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di rnams ni rang gi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: These are born from the concentration of one's lord,

original: de med par rang nyid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de med par rang nyid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: for without him they would not arise by themselves.

original: 'di ni 'di rnams mgu bar byed pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di rnams mgu bar byed pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: This is not to please or displease them,

original: 'on kyang yongs su tshim par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang yongs su tshim par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: but rather to satisfy them.

original: de la sems tsam gyi lus can nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams la mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab ste /
analyzed: de la sems tsam gyi lus can nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams la mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab ste /
translated: Therein, the consecration of the form-aggregate, etc. is by Akshobhya, because they are embodied in mere mind.

original: de'i @124b rang bzhin nyid du nye bar gsal ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i @124b rang bzhin nyid du nye bar gsal ba'i don du'o //
translated: It is for the sake of manifesting their nature.

original: byang chub sems las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pas so //
translated: Akshobhya, the vajra-holder, is by the bodhisattva, because of his origination from the mind of enlightenment.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: The vajra holder is Akṣhobhya.

original: rgyu'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the result is included within the cause,

original: 'bras bu kho nar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu kho nar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the result arises from the cause alone.

original: 'dis gnyis kar yang gnyis ka khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'di dag phan tshun rgyas gdab po //
analyzed: 'dis gnyis kar yang gnyis ka khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'di dag phan tshun rgyas gdab po //
translated: Because both of these pervade both, they are also sealed with each other.

original: de skad du yang gsungs pa /🔽'bras bus rgyu la rgyas gdab cing //
analyzed: de skad du yang gsungs pa / 'bras bus rgyu la rgyas gdab cing //
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The result seals the cause,

original: rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab bya //🔽bsgom bya gzhan du dngos grub ni //
analyzed: rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab bya // bsgom bya gzhan du dngos grub ni //
translated: and the cause seals the result.

original: bskal pa byed pas skye mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bskal pa byed pas skye mi 'gyur //
translated: If you meditate on the other, you will not attain power🔽even in a hundred eons.

original: zhes so // 'bras bu mi bskyod pas rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa la rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes so // 'bras bu mi bskyod pas rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa la rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Having sealed the cause, the vajra holder, with the result, Akṣhobhya, you should meditate.

original: 'bras bu la yang rgyu yis so //
analyzed: 'bras bu la yang rgyu yis so //
translated: The cause also seals the result.

original: gang yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can nyid du de dang der gsungs pa'i rgyas gdab pa de yang de ni ye shes lnga rnams su de'i bdag nyid kyis nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can nyid du de dang der gsungs pa'i rgyas gdab pa de yang de ni ye shes lnga rnams su de'i bdag nyid kyis nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, Vajradhara is the one who is crowned with the five Tathagatas, and he is sealed with that and that, as stated. He is the one who is the nature of the five gnoses, because they are included within him.

original: 'bras bu de rnams kyi ste rab tu bsgom pa'i dbang du byas nas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu de rnams kyi ste rab tu bsgom pa'i dbang du byas nas so //
translated: The result of those, in terms of the highest meditation, is the result of the five gnoses.

original: 'o na de lta na 'di dag kho na dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du rigs te /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na 'di dag kho na dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du rigs te /
translated: Well then, it is reasonable that just those are the lords of the mandala,

original: thams cad kyi bdag po nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag po nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: because they are the lords of all.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mos pa'i dbang las gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi de kho na nyid rnam par gzigs pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyang bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mos pa'i dbang las gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi de kho na nyid rnam par gzigs pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyang bdag po nyid do //
translated: No, it is not so, because Vairochana and so forth are also the lords, because they see the reality of the entire mandala from another perspective, in terms of the power of various kinds of interest.

original: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
translated: It will be said:

original: lha ni gang dang ci zhig ni //
analyzed: lha ni gang dang ci zhig ni //
translated: What and which deities

original: 'khor lo'i dbus su nges gnas pa'i //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbus su nges gnas pa'i //
translated: are definitely located in the center of the mandala?

original: mtshan mngon 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes //
analyzed: mtshan mngon 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes //
translated: The name of the vajra of manifestation

original: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
translated: is proclaimed by the buddhas of the mandala.

original: zhes so // rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab pa ni bu'i sgo nas pha'i rjes su 'brang ba na /
analyzed: zhes so // rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab pa ni bu'i sgo nas pha'i rjes su 'brang ba na /
translated: The seal of the lord of the family is the father's following of the son,

original: de las skyes pa nyid du bshad pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa nyid du bshad pa'i don du'o //
translated: which is explained as being born from that.

original: de kho na la mes po yang nang du 'dus so //
analyzed: de kho na la mes po yang nang du 'dus so //
translated: The grandfather is also included in that.

original: gang yang mi bskyod pa dkyil 'khor pa nyid yin pa de ni me long lta bu la sogs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ngo🔽bo yin pa de yis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang yang mi bskyod pa dkyil 'khor pa nyid yin pa de ni me long lta bu la sogs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa de yis rig par bya'o //
translated: And that Akṣhobhya is the mandala itself, which is the nature of the mirror-like and so forth, the very pure wisdoms, and is the very pure mirror-like and so forth

original: rgyas gdab @125a * //
analyzed: rgyas gdab @125a * //
translated: of the tathāgatas. That should be known.

original: pa la ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes tsam gyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: pa la ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes tsam gyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: In the seal, Akṣhobhya is the nature of the mere very pure wisdom of the dharmadhātu.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The bodhisattva meditative stabilizations are one part of the meditative stabilizations of the transcendent lords.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ming gzhan gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i shes rab kyis 'khyud pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ming gzhan gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i shes rab kyis 'khyud pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo //
translated: The bodhisattvas, such as Delusion Vajra and so forth, who will be explained below, are embraced by the wisdoms such as Form Vajra and so forth, and are sealed by the transcendent lords.

original: de ltar 'o na sa'i snying po la sogs pa lnga rnams dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa 'thob ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'o na sa'i snying po la sogs pa lnga rnams dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa 'thob ste /
translated: If that is so, then the five such as Kṣitigarbha and so forth, the five such as Form Vajra and so forth, and the five such as Locanā and so forth, are sealed by Vairocana.

original: 'di rnams gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di rnams gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: This is because they are one part of the aggregate of form.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni so sor de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni so sor de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because each of the transcendent lords is the nature of the five transcendent lords.

original: gzhan gyi yul la yang de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan bdag po nyid du yod do zhes pas /
analyzed: gzhan gyi yul la yang de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan bdag po nyid du yod do zhes pas /
translated: In the same way, in the realm of others, the other Tathāgatas exist as Lords.

original: ji ltar rigs par gzhan rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par gzhan rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: Thus, in the appropriate way, they are sealed by the others.

original: de ltar ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gti mug la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can du brjod par bya bas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gti mug la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can du brjod par bya bas so //
translated: Thus, the nature of the aggregate of compositional factors, which is delusion and so forth, is said to be the nature of the five Tathāgatas.

original: shin tu dang ba nyid kyi phyir mig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dang ba nyid kyi phyir mig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: The eye is sealed by Vairocana because of its extreme clarity.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba ni mi bskyod pas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba ni mi bskyod pas so //
translated: The ear is sealed by Akṣobhya because of its equality with space.

original: dri la longs spyod pa srid pa bar do dang cig shos kyi gnas skabs dag la dril mngon par dga' bas khyab pa'i phyir sna la rin chen dbang pos so //
analyzed: dri la longs spyod pa srid pa bar do dang cig shos kyi gnas skabs dag la dril mngon par dga' bas khyab pa'i phyir sna la rin chen dbang pos so //
translated: The nose is sealed by Ratnasaṃbhava because it is pervaded by Ratnasaṃbhava, who delights in smell, in the situation of the intermediate state of existence and the other.

original: ro la chags pa ni shin tu stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir lce la 'dod chags kyis so //
analyzed: ro la chags pa ni shin tu stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir lce la 'dod chags kyis so //
translated: The tongue is sealed by Passion because attachment to taste is extremely powerful.

original: lus kyi yan lag thams cad la rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir reg byed la don yod kyis so //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag thams cad la rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir reg byed la don yod kyis so //
translated: because it is the object of touch, since it pervades all the limbs of the body.

original: dbang po thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir yid la mi bskyod pas so //
analyzed: dbang po thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir yid la mi bskyod pas so //
translated: because it is the object of mind, since it accompanies all the sense faculties.

original: dbang po'i rjes su 'brang bas de'i yul gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa kha cig tu gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang po'i rjes su 'brang bas de'i yul gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa kha cig tu gsungs te /
translated: In some places, the sense faculties are said to be sealed by their objects, form, etc., following the sense faculties.

original: ji ltar ye shes zhabs kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs ltar ro //
analyzed: ji ltar ye shes zhabs kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs ltar ro //
translated: For example, according to the rite of Manjusri by Jnanapada.

original: kha cig tu ni rnam pa gzhan du @125b ste ;
analyzed: kha cig tu ni rnam pa gzhan du @125b ste ;
translated: In some places, it is otherwise,

original: ji ltar bsdus pa'i rim pa ltar ro //
analyzed: ji ltar bsdus pa'i rim pa ltar ro //
translated: according to the sequence of the compendium.

original: gti mug gi gzhi can nyid kyi phyir gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //🔽bstod pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mtho bar khengs pa'i phyir sgra la rin chen 'byung bas so //
analyzed: gti mug gi gzhi can nyid kyi phyir gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o // bstod pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mtho bar khengs pa'i phyir sgra la rin chen 'byung bas so //
translated: Form is sealed by Vairocana because it is the basis of delusion.🔽Sound is sealed by Ratnasaṃbhava because it is inflated by the sound of praise, etc.

original: gur gum la sogs pa rnams la rjes su chags pa'i phyir dri la 'od dpag med kyis so //
analyzed: gur gum la sogs pa rnams la rjes su chags pa'i phyir dri la 'od dpag med kyis so //
translated: Smell is sealed by Amitabha because one is attached to camphor, etc.

original: lus kyi yan lag thams cad tshim par byed cing rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rol don yod pas so //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag thams cad tshim par byed cing rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rol don yod pas so //
translated: because it satisfies all the limbs of the body and moves about.

original: dbang po thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir reg bya la mi bskyod pas te /
analyzed: dbang po thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir reg bya la mi bskyod pas te /
translated: Because it pervades all the sense organs, it is immovable by touch.

original: chos kyi dbyings la yang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la yang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: It is also in the dharma-dhātu.

original: sra zhing mkhregs pa nyid kyis gti mug chen po'i gzhi nyid kyi phyir sa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so //
analyzed: sra zhing mkhregs pa nyid kyis gti mug chen po'i gzhi nyid kyi phyir sa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis so //
translated: Because of its solidity and hardness, it is the basis of great delusion, so it is Vairocana in the earth.

original: chu ni nam mkha' bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir dang chad pa dang phug pa rnams kyang de lta kho nar sdud pas mi bskyod pa nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pas so //
analyzed: chu ni nam mkha' bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir dang chad pa dang phug pa rnams kyang de lta kho nar sdud pas mi bskyod pa nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod pas so //
translated: Because water is like space, and because it gathers together what is cut and pierced, it is Akṣobhya.

original: me de 'od dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir 'od dpag med kyis so //
analyzed: me de 'od dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir 'od dpag med kyis so //
translated: Because fire is by nature luminous, it is Amitābha.

original: rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rlung ni don yod kyis so //
analyzed: rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rlung ni don yod kyis so //
translated: Because it moves about, it is Amoghasiddhi.

original: gti mug dga' ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir spyan ma la sogs pa rnams gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug dga' ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir spyan ma la sogs pa rnams gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: Since they are the nature of the beloved of delusion, etc., Locana, etc. are sealed by Delusion Vajra, etc.

original: de bzhin du gti mug la nye bar longs spyod pa las dang gti mug zad pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir gshin rje mthar byed dang mi g-yo ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab par bya'o //🔽nga rgyal la nye bar longs spyod pa dang nga rgyal zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung bas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gti mug la nye bar longs spyod pa las dang gti mug zad pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir gshin rje mthar byed dang mi g-yo ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab par bya'o // nga rgyal la nye bar longs spyod pa dang nga rgyal zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung bas so //
translated: Similarly, since they are the nature of the enjoyment of delusion and the exhaustion of delusion, Yamantaka and Acala are sealed by Vairocana.🔽Since they are the nature of the enjoyment of pride and the exhaustion of pride, Prajnantaka and Kama raja are sealed by Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: 'dod chags la longs spyod pa las dang 'dod chags zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir padma mthar byed dang dbyug pa sngon po 'od dpag med kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod chags la longs spyod pa las dang 'dod chags zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir padma mthar byed dang dbyug pa sngon po 'od dpag med kyis so //
translated: Since they are the nature of the enjoyment of passion and the exhaustion of passion, Padma-n-taka and Nīladaṇḍa are sealed by Amitābha.

original: phrag dog la longs spyod pa dang phrag dog zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang stobs po che don yod kyis so //
analyzed: phrag dog la longs spyod pa dang phrag dog zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang stobs po che don yod kyis so //
translated: Since he enjoys jealousy and is the essence of the exhaustion of jealousy, he is Amṛtakuṇḍali and Takkirāja.

original: zhe sdang la longs spyod pa dang zhe sdang zad pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po mi bskyod pas so //🔽'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs su ni sems las skye ba'i khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang dang khro bo'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i @126a * //
analyzed: zhe sdang la longs spyod pa dang zhe sdang zad pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po mi bskyod pas so // 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs su ni sems las skye ba'i khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang dang khro bo'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i @126a * //
translated: Since he enjoys hatred and is the essence of the exhaustion of hatred, he is Uṣṇīṣacakravartin and Sumbharāja.

original: phyir khro bo brgyad rnams mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir khro bo brgyad rnams mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: In the sādhana of Mañjuvajra, the eight wrathful ones are sealed by Akṣobhya, because they are the essence of the special arising from the mind and because they are the essence of wrath.

original: sems las skye ba'i khyad par nyid yod na yang gshin rje mthar byed pa dang padma mthar byed dag sngar bzhin zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: sems las skye ba'i khyad par nyid yod na yang gshin rje mthar byed pa dang padma mthar byed dag sngar bzhin zhes 'dod do //
translated: Even though there is a special arising from the mind, one should understand that Yamāntaka and Padmāntaka are as before.

original: gang kha cig tu rigs kyi bdag po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams su nang du 'dus par gsungs pa de rang gi ngo bo tha mi dad par bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gang kha cig tu rigs kyi bdag po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams su nang du 'dus par gsungs pa de rang gi ngo bo tha mi dad par bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: In some places, the lords of the families are included among the bodhisattvas, and that is taught to have the meaning of their not being different in nature.

original: rigs kyi bdag po'i kha dog gi rim pa las 'das pa la rgyu dang yang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po'i kha dog gi rim pa las 'das pa la rgyu dang yang /
translated: The order of the colors of the lords of the families is passed over.

original: ci ltar rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa tha mi dad pa la 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams tha dad ces pa'i dogs pas gang ba la /
analyzed: ci ltar rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa tha mi dad pa la 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams tha dad ces pa'i dogs pas gang ba la /
translated: Since there is the doubt that the result vajra holders are different from the cause vajra holder who is not different,

original: bcom ldan 'das kho nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kho nas gsungs pa /
translated: the Bhagavān himself taught:

original: rgyags pas kha dog tha dad de //
analyzed: rgyags pas kha dog tha dad de //
translated: “The different colors are due to pride,

original: ro yi snying yang de bzhin no //🔽rang gi rgyu ni dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: ro yi snying yang de bzhin no // rang gi rgyu ni dbang bskur bas //
translated: and the essence of the flavor is the same.🔽The cause is the empowerment,

original: 'bras bu rten gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu rten gyi dbye bas so //
translated: and the result is the division of the support.

original: sngags kyis chos ni dbye bar bya //
analyzed: sngags kyis chos ni dbye bar bya //
translated: The mantra is divided by the dharma,

original: rig ma'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: rig ma'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so //
translated: and the knowledge consort is by the dharma mudra.”

original: zhes so // rgyags pa ni 'dir sems spro ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes so // rgyags pa ni 'dir sems spro ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: Here, pride is a special kind of mental elation.

original: de'i tha dad las sa bon la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tha dad las sa bon la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog tha dad pa'o //
translated: From its difference, there is the difference of color of the seed, etc.

original: ro ni so so rang la yod pa'i bsam pa'i 'gyur ba'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: ro ni so so rang la yod pa'i bsam pa'i 'gyur ba'i bye brag ste /
translated: Taste is the particular modification of the individual's own thought.

original: snying na sems so //
analyzed: snying na sems so //
translated: It is the heart-mind.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dang po pa'i sa bon la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye ba dang snying ga'i sa bon gyi dbye ba ji ltar rigs par brjod do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dang po pa'i sa bon la sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye ba dang snying ga'i sa bon gyi dbye ba ji ltar rigs par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the color-distinctions of the seed, etc., of the first stage, and the distinctions of the heart-seed, are to be stated as appropriate.

original: rang gi rgyu ni ji ltar rigs par zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu ni ji ltar rigs par zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The individual causes are hatred, etc., as appropriate.

original: de dbang bskur bas tha dad de //
analyzed: de dbang bskur bas tha dad de //
translated: They are different by the consecration.

original: rgyas 'debs pa las so //
analyzed: rgyas 'debs pa las so //
translated: From the seal-impression.

original: rgyu'i dbye ba las rgyas 'debs pa'i dbye ba'o zhes pas gang du rgyas 'debs tha dad pa der rgyu yang tha dad pa kho na'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i dbye ba las rgyas 'debs pa'i dbye ba'o zhes pas gang du rgyas 'debs tha dad pa der rgyu yang tha dad pa kho na'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: From the distinction of cause, there is the distinction of seal-impression. Thus, where there is a difference of seal-impression, there is a difference of cause.🔽This is to be understood.

original: de ltar kha dog gi dbye ba la sogs pa la yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar kha dog gi dbye ba la sogs pa la yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It is to be understood in the same way with the distinctions of color, etc.

original: de ltar rigs gcig nyid du yod na yang bsam pa'i 'gyur ba'i dbye ba las dang / spro ba'i dbye ba las khro bo la sogs pa rnams las rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams dbye bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de ltar rigs gcig nyid du yod na yang bsam pa'i 'gyur ba'i dbye ba las dang / spro ba'i dbye ba las khro bo la sogs pa rnams las rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams dbye bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: Thus, although there is only one type, the distinctions of the transformation of thought and the distinctions of emanation are the distinctions of Vajradhara and so on from Krodha and so on.

original: bsam pa'i 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba med na yang khro bo rnams kha cig zhe sdang gi rigs nyid yin gyi zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa'i 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba med na yang khro bo rnams kha cig zhe sdang gi rigs nyid yin gyi zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
translated: Even without the distinctions of the transformation of thought and so on, some of the wrathful deities are the type of hatred but not the essence of hatred,

original: sems las skye ba'i khyad par rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / mi @126b bskyod pas ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems las skye ba'i khyad par rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang / mi @126b bskyod pas ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are the essence of the special generation from mind, and because Akshobhya is the essence of mind.

original: de ltar rten gyi dbye ba las ji skad bshad pa'i ngo bo gnas kyi khyad par bskyed nas /
analyzed: de ltar rten gyi dbye ba las ji skad bshad pa'i ngo bo gnas kyi khyad par bskyed nas /
translated: Thus, the distinctions of the basis generate the distinctions of the abode as explained.

original: rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshungs na yang 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshungs na yang 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: Even though the causal Vajradhara is the same, the resultant Vajradhara is different.

original: de yang gtso bo'i phyir 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang gtso bo'i phyir 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the result vajra holder should be understood as taught from the perspective of the nature of mind.

original: ngag gi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni sngags kyis zhes pa sa bon gyi yi ges chos zhes pa yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngags so //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni sngags kyis zhes pa sa bon gyi yi ges chos zhes pa yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngags so //
translated: The teaching from the perspective of speech is the mantra, the seed syllable, the mantra that is the nature of the three syllables, and so on.

original: de ltar rig ma yang ste lus kyang chos kyi phyag rgyas zhes pa sa bon de kho nas so zhes pa shin tu 'phros pas chog go //
analyzed: de ltar rig ma yang ste lus kyang chos kyi phyag rgyas zhes pa sa bon de kho nas so zhes pa shin tu 'phros pas chog go //
translated: The statement “the knowledge consort also” and “the body also” is the seed syllable itself.

original: 'di ltar man ngag ji lta bar bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar man ngag ji lta bar bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di'o //
translated: This is the stage of meditation according to the intimate instruction.

original: snga bar sgom pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la ji ltar bde bar 'dug pas /
analyzed: snga bar sgom pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la ji ltar bde bar 'dug pas /
translated: The stage of meditation is as follows: In a place that is suitable for meditation, sit on a comfortable seat in any comfortable way.

original: aom a'a: h'um zhes pas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes pas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
translated: Protect the place, oneself, and the yoga with oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: dam tshig bsten pa sngon ma can gyis gtor ma byin te /
analyzed: dam tshig bsten pa sngon ma can gyis gtor ma byin te /
translated: Give the torma to the pledge beings as before.

original: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa la bltas nas snying rje bar gyur bzhin pas /
analyzed: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa la bltas nas snying rje bar gyur bzhin pas /
translated: Having looked at all the suffering beings, one should generate compassion.

original: yud kyis stong pa nyid du mos pa las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid lhag par mos nas /
analyzed: yud kyis stong pa nyid du mos pa las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid lhag par mos nas /
translated: From the instant of devotion to emptiness, one should imagine oneself as Vajrasattva endowed with the hand implements, colors, and so on, as will be explained, together with wisdom.

original: rang gi snying gar aam yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems mngon par gsal ba'i ngo bo //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar aam yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems mngon par gsal ba'i ngo bo //
translated: At one’s heart, on a moon arisen from the letter A, is the essence of the clear light of bodhicitta.

original: dbus su sngon po nyid kyis dang phyi rol du dkar po nyid kyis dngul chu 'dra ba'i mdog can gyi h'um yig 'od zer lnga 'phro ba yang dag par bltas te /
analyzed: dbus su sngon po nyid kyis dang phyi rol du dkar po nyid kyis dngul chu 'dra ba'i mdog can gyi h'um yig 'od zer lnga 'phro ba yang dag par bltas te /
translated: In the center, it is blue, and on the outside, it is the color of mercury, white with a tinge of blue. It is the letter hūṃ, radiating five-colored light rays.

original: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis lus mtha' dag snang bar byas nas phyir 'phros pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis lus mtha' dag snang bar byas nas phyir 'phros pa rnams kyis /
translated: The mass of light rays illuminates the entire body and then radiates out.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor ba'i lha dang bcas pa 'og min gyi mthar thug pa bdag nyid dang nye bar mdun gyi nam mkha' la mar me len pa'i rigs pas bkug nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor ba'i lha dang bcas pa 'og min gyi mthar thug pa bdag nyid dang nye bar mdun gyi nam mkha' la mar me len pa'i rigs pas bkug nas /
translated: The Bhagavat Vajrasattva together with the deities of the mandala, from the end of Akanistha, are summoned into the space in front of oneself by the method of taking a butter lamp.

original: h'um yig la 'od zer zhugs pa'i rjes thogs su cig car spros pa'i lha mo bcu drug po rnams @127a * //
analyzed: h'um yig la 'od zer zhugs pa'i rjes thogs su cig car spros pa'i lha mo bcu drug po rnams @127a * //
translated: Immediately after the light rays enter the syllable hūṃ, the sixteen goddesses emanated are

original: kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: to make offerings.

original: de la gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang rnga zlum ma dang rdza rnga ma dang bzhad ma dang sgeg mo dang glu ma dang gar ma dang me tog ma dang bdug pa ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma dang / me long ma dang reg bya ma rnams phyi'i mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de la gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang rnga zlum ma dang rdza rnga ma dang bzhad ma dang sgeg mo dang glu ma dang gar ma dang me tog ma dang bdug pa ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma dang / me long ma dang reg bya ma rnams phyi'i mchod pa ste /
translated: Among them, the flute goddess, the lute goddess, the drum goddess, the clay drum goddess, the laughter goddess, the flirtatious goddess, the song goddess, the dance goddess, the flower goddess, the incense goddess, the lamp goddess, the perfume goddess, the mirror goddess, the touch goddess, the taste goddess, and the dharma goddess are the outer offerings.

original: reg bya mas sna tshogs pa'i gos 'bul ba'o //
analyzed: reg bya mas sna tshogs pa'i gos 'bul ba'o //
translated: The touch goddess offers various garments.

original: ro mas gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
analyzed: ro mas gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
translated: The taste goddess offers the secret offering.

original: chos mas de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ste /
analyzed: chos mas de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ste /
translated: The dharma goddess offers the suchness offering.

original: rdo rje snyems ma la rab tu zhugs nas /
analyzed: rdo rje snyems ma la rab tu zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered into Vajragarvi,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud de bde ba chen po'i rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud de bde ba chen po'i rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he embraces the Lord and makes him passionate with great bliss.

original: de'i rjes su phyag 'tshal zhing /
analyzed: de'i rjes su phyag 'tshal zhing /
translated: After that, he pays homage,

original: bdag nyid kyi sdig pa bdag gis 'chags shing slar yang mi bgyid do //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi sdig pa bdag gis 'chags shing slar yang mi bgyid do //
translated: confessing his own sins and not committing them again.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: He rejoices in all the merit of the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, Aryas, and ordinary beings.

original: bdag nyid dang 'gro ba'i dge ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang 'gro ba'i dge ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
translated: He dedicates himself and the world's virtue to the cause of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi bar du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma chos dkon mchog dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabs su mchi'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi bar du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma chos dkon mchog dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabs su mchi'o //
translated: Until enlightenment, he takes refuge in the Buddha Jewel, the Perfection of Wisdom Dharma Jewel, and the Sangha Jewel of irreversible Bodhisattvas.

original: ae ma ma la bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: ae ma ma la bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi'o //
translated: Oh! I will attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening!

original: de'i lam sgrub pas bde ba chen po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba /
analyzed: de'i lam sgrub pas bde ba chen po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba /
translated: By accomplishing its path, [one attains] the bliss of being free from the suffering of samsara.

original: nam mkha' ji srid par rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji srid par rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba /
translated: [It arises] uninterruptedly for as long as space exists.🔽[One] will establish all sentient beings in the state of being of one taste with suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa la sems can rnams thams cad dgod par bgyi'o zhes sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa la sems can rnams thams cad dgod par bgyi'o zhes sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ba'am /
translated: Thus, one should confess misdeeds and so forth, or

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i rjes thogs su /🔽byang chub sems ni bla na med //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i rjes thogs su / byang chub sems ni bla na med //
translated: immediately after going for refuge to the Three Jewels,🔽[one should recite]:🔽I will generate the unsurpassed

original: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
analyzed: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
translated: sacred mind of enlightenment.🔽...

original: zhes pa nas sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
analyzed: zhes pa nas sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
translated: I will establish sentient beings in nirvana.

original: ces pa'i mtha' thug pa don mngon du byed cing bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa'i mtha' thug pa don mngon du byed cing bklag par bya'o //
translated: One should read up to the end of this [verse].

original: de ltar dge ba'i tshogs nye bar bsags nas ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don du /
analyzed: de ltar dge ba'i tshogs nye bar bsags nas ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don du /
translated: Thus, having accumulated the collection of virtue, for the sake of the collection of wisdom,

original: 'gro ba de nyid lta ba'i dra bas 'khrugs pa la bltas nas gdon par 'dod @127b pas ;
analyzed: 'gro ba de nyid lta ba'i dra bas 'khrugs pa la bltas nas gdon par 'dod @127b pas ;
translated: Having seen that migrating beings are disturbed by the net of views, one should wish to liberate them.

original: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir dang ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po rnams dang de'i rgyu rnams kyang ma dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir dang ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po rnams dang de'i rgyu rnams kyang ma dmigs pa ste /
translated: Since ultimate awakening mind is free of a nature as one or many, unborn, and so forth, one does not observe things and their causes.

original: dngos po ma grub na dngos po med pa yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir de la yang mi gnas pa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par chos rnams thams cad bsgom pa bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma grub na dngos po med pa yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir de la yang mi gnas pa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par chos rnams thams cad bsgom pa bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Since things are not established, their absence is not established either. Therefore, one should cultivate the meditation that all phenomena are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, without abiding in those.

original: de nas / aom a'a: h'um gi ngo bor bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid steng dang 'og dang 'og tu gnas pa gzugs brnyan lta bu stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par rtog cing ;
analyzed: de nas / aom a'a: h'um gi ngo bor bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid steng dang 'og dang 'og tu gnas pa gzugs brnyan lta bu stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par rtog cing ;
translated: Then, one’s body, speech, and mind, abiding above, below, and in between, should be imagined to be of the nature of oṃ āḥ hūṃ, like a reflection, and one taste with emptiness.

original: aom yig a'a: yig la dang / aa yig gdon dang bcas pa h'um yig la dang / au yig ha yig la dang de mgo bo la dang / mgo bo zla ba phyed pa la dang / de thig le la dang thig le n'a da la nang du gzhug ste /
analyzed: aom yig a'a: yig la dang / aa yig gdon dang bcas pa h'um yig la dang / au yig ha yig la dang de mgo bo la dang / mgo bo zla ba phyed pa la dang / de thig le la dang thig le n'a da la nang du gzhug ste /
translated: The head dissolves into the crescent moon, that [crescent moon] dissolves into the drop, and the drop dissolves into the nada.

original: skra'i rtse mo brgya phrag stong gi cha'i tshad du gzhag nas snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo brgya phrag stong gi cha'i tshad du gzhag nas snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having reduced it to the size of the tip of a hair split into a hundred parts, one should cultivate great compassion.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ

original: zhes pa'i sngags kyi don mngon du byed pas /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags kyi don mngon du byed pas /
translated: By actualizing the meaning of this mantra,

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid la rab tu gzhug cing n'a da tsam gyi rnam par rtog pa yang yongs su dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid la rab tu gzhug cing n'a da tsam gyi rnam par rtog pa yang yongs su dor bar bya'o //
translated: one should enter into emptiness, the nature of the non-apprehension of all phenomena, and one should also completely abandon the concept of the mere nada.

original: de'i rjes su snying rje chen po'i dbang gis /
analyzed: de'i rjes su snying rje chen po'i dbang gis /
translated: After that, through the power of great compassion,

original: n'a da'i ngo bor bdag nyid srid pa bar do'i rang bzhin nam mkha' la gzhag nas /
analyzed: n'a da'i ngo bor bdag nyid srid pa bar do'i rang bzhin nam mkha' la gzhag nas /
translated: one should place oneself in the nature of the nada in the space of the intermediate state of existence.

original: sna tshogs chu skyes la ram las skyes pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od zer las skyes pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs rnams kyis mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo
analyzed: sna tshogs chu skyes la ram las skyes pa'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od zer las skyes pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs rnams kyis mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo
translated: From the light rays of the HUM arise blazing vajras, which fill the space without any gaps, becoming a vajra fence, a vajra tent, a net of vajra arrows, and a canopy.

original: rje'i ra ba dang gur dang mda'i dra ba dang bla re dang / 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi rjes su bsams nas /
analyzed: rje'i ra ba dang gur dang mda'i dra ba dang bla re dang / 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi rjes su bsams nas /
translated: Below, one should imagine a ground that has the nature of a variegated vajra cross.

original: de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i bhr'um yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo ser po g-yas skor du 'khor ba rtsibs bcu pa'i lte ba'i dbus kyi bar skabs su gnas pa'i bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
analyzed: de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i bhr'um yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo ser po g-yas skor du 'khor ba rtsibs bcu pa'i lte ba'i dbus kyi bar skabs su gnas pa'i bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
translated: In the center of that, on a variegated lotus and sun, there is a BHRUM, which completely transforms into a yellow wheel with ten spokes, turning to the right.

original: la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpar lhag par mos te /
analyzed: la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpar lhag par mos te /
translated: In the center of the hub, one should imagine oneself as Vajrasattva, with the body color, hand implements, and so on, as will be explained.

original: rang gi snying ga'i @128a * //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i @128a * //
translated: In the center of the wheel, there is a moon mandala.

original: sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis khro bo bcus yongs su bskor ba'i mi bskyod pa spyan drangs pa kha nas bcug pa zhu bar gyur pa lha mo'i mtsho skyes su khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mi bskyod par bltas shing /
analyzed: sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis khro bo bcus yongs su bskor ba'i mi bskyod pa spyan drangs pa kha nas bcug pa zhu bar gyur pa lha mo'i mtsho skyes su khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mi bskyod par bltas shing /
translated: Visualize Akshobhya and the assembly of wrathful ones in the lake-born goddess.

original: h'um zhes brjod la mi bskyod pa spros nas rang gi lus dang ro mnyam par byas te /
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod la mi bskyod pa spros nas rang gi lus dang ro mnyam par byas te /
translated: Recite “hum” and emanate Akshobhya, who becomes of the same taste as one’s body.🔽The form of Vajrasattva transforms completely into the form of Vajra Humkara.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs kyi h'um yig bcu po rnams kyi khro bo bcu rnams spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs kyi h'um yig bcu po rnams kyi khro bo bcu rnams spro bar bya'o //
translated: The ten hum syllables emanate the ten wrathful ones.

original: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
translated: As will be said:

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas //
translated: Having become the conqueror of the three realms,

original: bgegs rnams thams cad bskrad par bya //
analyzed: bgegs rnams thams cad bskrad par bya //
translated: all obstructors are expelled.

original: slar yang khro bo rnam rgyal gyur //
analyzed: slar yang khro bo rnam rgyal gyur //
translated: Again, one becomes the wrathful conqueror.

original: zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgoms te //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgoms te //
translated: Meditate on the three faces and six arms

original: khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya //
analyzed: khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya //
translated: and emanate the clouds of wrathful ones.

original: zhes so // de la rdo rje h'um mdzad khros pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba'i me lce'i tshogs can /
analyzed: zhes so // de la rdo rje h'um mdzad khros pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba'i me lce'i tshogs can /
translated: In that, Vajra Humkara is wrathful, like the fire at the time of destruction, with a mass of blazing tongues of flame.

original: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs dbang med pa rnams za ba lta bu sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum gdangs shing rnam par 'gyur ba can /
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs dbang med pa rnams za ba lta bu sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu'i rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum gdangs shing rnam par 'gyur ba can /
translated: He is blue, yellow, and green, with three faces, gaping and contorted, like one who devours the helpless hordes of obstructors of all migrating beings.

original: mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'gyur ba /
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'gyur ba /
translated: He bares his fangs and his tongue is curled.

original: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba /
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba /
translated: He is extremely terrifying.

original: zhal so so la smin ma 'khyog cing g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa yang yang du h'um yig sgrogs pas nga ro 'don cing phyogs su lta ba /🔽dpral ba'i steng du yongs su bskor ba'i thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can mgul bar 'phyang ba'i khrag 'dzag cing /
analyzed: zhal so so la smin ma 'khyog cing g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa yang yang du h'um yig sgrogs pas nga ro 'don cing phyogs su lta ba / dpral ba'i steng du yongs su bskor ba'i thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can mgul bar 'phyang ba'i khrag 'dzag cing /
translated: Each face has three eyes, red and round, with eyebrows that are crooked and moving, and he repeatedly utters the sound of hum, looking in the directions.

original: dring ba'i mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng ba can /
analyzed: dring ba'i mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng ba can /
translated: He has a garland of five skulls that completely encircles his forehead, a garland of fifty fresh heads dripping with blood hanging around his neck,🔽and a garland of fifty fresh heads dripping with blood hanging around his neck.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo can dang rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang phyag gdub dang mgo bo'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo can dang rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang phyag gdub dang mgo bo'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with a human bone necklace, earrings, bracelets, anklets, and a head ornament.

original: stag gi pags pa'i gos bshus pa /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i gos bshus pa /
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt.

original: mi rus las byung ba'i thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa /
analyzed: mi rus las byung ba'i thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa /
translated: He is smeared with the fine dust of human bone char.

original: mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba dkris pa /
analyzed: mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba dkris pa /
translated: His upward-streaming orange hair is bound with a blue ananta.

original: 'jog po dmar pos rna ba'i rgyan du byas pa //🔽padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba'i padma chen pos do shal byas pa /
analyzed: 'jog po dmar pos rna ba'i rgyan du byas pa // padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba'i padma chen pos do shal byas pa /
translated: Takshaka the red is his earring.🔽A great lotus white as a lotus root is his necklace.

original: d'ur ba ltar ljang ba'i stobs kyi rgyus se ral khar byas pa /
analyzed: d'ur ba ltar ljang ba'i stobs kyi rgyus se ral khar byas pa /
translated: A green dhurta is his sash.

original: nor @128b rgyas dkar pos ske rags byas pa /
analyzed: nor @128b rgyas dkar pos ske rags byas pa /
translated: A white makara is his belt.

original: kun da ltar dkar ba'i padmas rkang gdub byas pa /
analyzed: kun da ltar dkar ba'i padmas rkang gdub byas pa /
translated: A white kunda lotus is his anklet.

original: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa /
analyzed: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa /
translated: Pundarika the yellow is his bracelet.

original: du ba lta bu khra bo'i rigs ldan gyis dpung rgyan byas pa /
analyzed: du ba lta bu khra bo'i rigs ldan gyis dpung rgyan byas pa /
translated: A multicolored kinnara like smoke is his armlet.

original: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa /
translated: He is sealed with Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rang 'dra'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /🔽rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings shing //
analyzed: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rang 'dra'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa ste / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings shing //
translated: With his two hands holding a vajra and a vajra-bell, he is in union with a wisdom-being similar to himself, with the gesture of victory over the three worlds.🔽Form the two vajra fists,

original: dpung pa rdo rje mnyam gzhag nas //🔽mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcing byas pa //
analyzed: dpung pa rdo rje mnyam gzhag nas // mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcing byas pa //
translated: placing the vajras at the shoulders,🔽binding the two little fingers as hooks,

original: sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni //
translated: and threatening with the two index fingers.

original: 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the “victory over the three worlds.”

original: zhes de kho na nyid 'dus par te /
analyzed: zhes de kho na nyid 'dus par te /
translated: This is from the Compendium of Principles Tantra.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sprad nas sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba dang phyag g-yas pa dag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa dag dang / g-yon pa dag na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sprad nas sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba dang phyag g-yas pa dag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa dag dang / g-yon pa dag na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dag ste /
translated: Form the two vajra fists with the two index fingers extended and threatening, with the iron hook and noose in the right hands and the skull cup and khaṭvāṅga in the left hands.

original: g-yas brkyang gi stabs kyis zhabs gnyis kyis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang gi stabs kyis zhabs gnyis kyis 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa'o //
translated: He stands with his two feet in the full-lotus posture pressing on Bhairava and Kālarātri.

original: de'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'o //
translated: Below him is a sun on a multicolored lotus.

original: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams nas /
translated: Having thus contemplated oneself as Vajra Hūṃkara,

original: khro bo rnams 'byin bzhin par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams 'byin bzhin par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine the wrathful ones being emitted.

original: de la gshin rje gshed rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje ro langs ma la yang dag par 'khyud pa /
analyzed: de la gshin rje gshed rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje ro langs ma la yang dag par 'khyud pa /
translated: There, one should imagine Yamāntaka, who is similar to oneself, embracing Vajra Vetālī,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa /
translated: sealed with Vairochana.

original: shar gyi rtsibs la gnas pa nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag g-yas pa rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje rnams te /
analyzed: shar gyi rtsibs la gnas pa nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag g-yas pa rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje rnams te /
translated: He is black, white, and red-faced, standing on the eastern spoke, with a vajra goad, wheel, and vajra in his right hands,

original: g-yon pa rnams su thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang dgra sta rnams so //
analyzed: g-yon pa rnams su thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang dgra sta rnams so //
translated: and a lasso with an upraised threatening gesture at the heart, a bell, and a battle-ax in his left hands.

original: lhor gzhan gyis mi thub pa rang dang 'dra ba'i gzhan gyis mi thub ma la 'khyud pa rin 'byung gis rgyas btab pa /
analyzed: lhor gzhan gyis mi thub pa rang dang 'dra ba'i gzhan gyis mi thub ma la 'khyud pa rin 'byung gis rgyas btab pa /
translated: In the south, Aparājitā embraces Aparājitā, who is similar to oneself, sealed with Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dkar po dang nag po dang dmar ba'i zhal can te /
analyzed: dkar po dang nag po dang dmar ba'i zhal can te /
translated: He is white, black, and red-faced.

original: g-yas pa rnams su rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang / g-yon pa rnams su snying gar sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa rnams su rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang / g-yon pa rnams su snying gar sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta'o //
translated: In his right hands he holds a vajra lasso, a vajra, and a sword; in his left hands he holds a heart at his heart, a bell, and a battle-ax.

original: nub tu rta mgrin rang dang 'dra ba'i khro gnyer can ma la yang dag par @129a * //
analyzed: nub tu rta mgrin rang dang 'dra ba'i khro gnyer can ma la yang dag par @129a * //
translated: In the west is Hayagrīva, in union with a Sumbha female, who is similar to him.

original: sbyor ba / 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /
analyzed: sbyor ba / 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /
