translated: Thus, because of the dance, Vajrasattva is endowed with the perfection of his own aim. Therefore, the treatise is taught from that alone, and not from anything else.

original: thabs byung de rgyu lkog gyur pas //
analyzed: thabs byung de rgyu lkog gyur pas //
translated: The means of attainment is a hidden phenomenon,

original: de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin //
analyzed: de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin //
translated: and its explanation is difficult.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa de nyid shes pa'i slob dpon zhes dor bar bya ba dang rgyu dang bcas pa'i rang gi ngo bo mngon sum du byed pa las gzhan rnams la de dag spang ba dang len pa kun du spyod pa bskul ba la legs pa🔽ni mkhas par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa de nyid shes pa'i slob dpon zhes dor bar bya ba dang rgyu dang bcas pa'i rang gi ngo bo mngon sum du byed pa las gzhan rnams la de dag spang ba dang len pa kun du spyod pa bskul ba la legs pa ni mkhas par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, the master who knows reality is skilled in teaching the abandonment and adoption of those to others, through direct perception of the nature of the abandonment and adoption together with the cause.

original: gzhan du nam yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du nam yin no //
translated: He is skilled, but not otherwise.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rgyu'i gnas skabs su lung gi rjes su 'brang zhing /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rgyu'i gnas skabs su lung gi rjes su 'brang zhing /
translated: Therefore, in the causal period, he follows scripture.

original: de kho na nyid las nges pa'i don gyis /
analyzed: de kho na nyid las nges pa'i don gyis /
translated: Through the definitive meaning of reality,

original: gsang chen te bde byed la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo 'byung ba ste thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas 'bras bu gnas skabs su gsal bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: gsang chen te bde byed la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo 'byung ba ste thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas 'bras bu gnas skabs su gsal bar gyur pa ni /
translated: The essence of the topic that is not the domain of the conduct of the🔽great secret, such as the conduct of the creator, is the arising, that is, the🔽clarification of the result through the process of hearing, reflection, and🔽cultivation.

original: mchog tu ste rab kyi mthar thug pa la gnas par yongs su mngon du byed do //
analyzed: mchog tu ste rab kyi mthar thug pa la gnas par yongs su mngon du byed do //
translated: The nature of the topic, which is not the domain of the Great Secret, i.e., the performance of the welfare of others, etc., is the arising, i.e., the hearing, reflection, and meditation, which is the result, the clear manifestation in the situation of the supreme, i.e., the ultimate, the highest.

original: de ltar na rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one becomes a Vajra Holder endowed with the perfection of one's own and others' aims.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni mgo med ni sngar bzhin du h'um do //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni mgo med ni sngar bzhin du h'um do //
translated: In the creation stage, the head is the Hum as before.

original: @158b mgo bo ni aom mo //
analyzed: @158b mgo bo ni aom mo //
translated: The head is the Om.

original: n'a da'i mtha' ni ham ngo //🔽gsang ba'i padma ni aom ste /
analyzed: n'a da'i mtha' ni ham ngo // gsang ba'i padma ni aom ste /
translated: The end of the nada is the Ham.🔽The secret lotus is the Om.

original: gsang ba'i padma 'di'i rten yin zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padma 'di'i rten yin zhes byas nas so //
translated: This secret lotus is the support of the Om.

original: h'um yig la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta bar bdag gi gdan la sogs pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: h'um yig la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta bar bdag gi gdan la sogs pa'i gnas so //
translated: The letters Hum, etc., are the seats of the self, etc., in the proper order.

original: rim pa gnyis mdor bstan pa 'di ni skabs bzhin du rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis mdor bstan pa 'di ni skabs bzhin du rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro // rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa /
translated: This brief presentation of the two stages will be explained extensively in the appropriate context.

original: sngon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The creation stage of Vajrasattva is stated in the lines beginning with “previously.”

original: thams cad de gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa rnams /
analyzed: thams cad de gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa rnams /
translated: All means the form realms and so forth.

original: sngon du rab tu byed pa dang por gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi stong nyid de nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa des bkrus nas so //
analyzed: sngon du rab tu byed pa dang por gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi stong nyid de nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa des bkrus nas so //
translated: Having washed with just that emptiness characterized as previously stated in the first chapter, and with the characteristics of signlessness and wishlessness,

original: sgro btags pa'i dri ma ste gos pa'o //
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i dri ma ste gos pa'o //
translated: the stains of superimposition are the stains of attachment.

original: dkar ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dkar ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: White, etc.

original: dkar po kun da zla ba dang 'dra ba'i mdog gang gi yin pa de ste /
analyzed: dkar po kun da zla ba dang 'dra ba'i mdog gang gi yin pa de ste /
translated: White is the color like a jasmine flower or the moon.

original: gnyis pa'i don la drug pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i don la drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth case is used for the second case.

original: zla ba'i 'od rnams bzhin du 'di'i 'od zer rnams 'phro ba ni gyen du 'greng ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od rnams bzhin du 'di'i 'od zer rnams 'phro ba ni gyen du 'greng ba'o //
translated: His light rays shine like the light of the moon, standing upright.

original: sems dpa'i skyil krung can ni de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil krung can ni de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He has the sattva posture, because he possesses that.

original: bzhugs pa ni 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni 'dug pa'o //
translated: Abiding is sitting.

original: phyag rgya chen po ni rang 'dra'i shes rab ma ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni rang 'dra'i shes rab ma ste /
translated: The great seal is the wisdom consort who is similar to oneself.

original: de la phyag gnyis dag gis gnas pa ste gnas pa la btsir ba'o //
analyzed: de la phyag gnyis dag gis gnas pa ste gnas pa la btsir ba'o //
translated: One should abide, that is, press, with the two hands on her.

original: gzugs rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i mdzes pa ste 'dod par bya ba nyid 'di'i yin pa ni gzugs rdzogs pa'i mdzes pa can no //
analyzed: gzugs rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i mdzes pa ste 'dod par bya ba nyid 'di'i yin pa ni gzugs rdzogs pa'i mdzes pa can no //
translated: The perfection of beauty with forms is the perfection of beauty with forms, that is, the state of being desirable.

original: de ltar ye shes sems dpa' rnams la ste ye shes sems dpa' gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes sems dpa' rnams la ste ye shes sems dpa' gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa'o //
translated: Thus, in the case of the wisdom beings, that is, in the case of the meditation on the commitment being, who is of the nature of the nondual wisdom of the two wisdom beings.

original: de las gzhan pa'i bsgom par bya ba gsungs pa /🔽chu shing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i bsgom par bya ba gsungs pa / chu shing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The meditation on something else is stated:🔽The banana tree, etc.

original: cung zad kha bye ba nyid kyis na chu shing gi me tog bzhin du gnas pa'i rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: cung zad kha bye ba nyid kyis na chu shing gi me tog bzhin du gnas pa'i rtsa rnams so //
translated: The channels are like banana flowers, that is, they are situated like banana flowers, because they are slightly open.

original: lte bar de rnams kho na bsgreng ba ste gyen du son pa snying gar gnas pa'i padma'o //
analyzed: lte bar de rnams kho na bsgreng ba ste gyen du son pa snying gar gnas pa'i padma'o //
translated: At the navel, those very [channels] are erect, that is, they go upward, and they are the lotus situated at the heart.

original: sngar gyi rab tu byed pa bzhi par gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi rab tu byed pa bzhi par gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: It is the complete perfection of the characteristics taught in the fourth chapter above.

original: spros nas ni phyung nas so //
analyzed: spros nas ni phyung nas so //
translated: Having emanated, having brought forth,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa dang dus mnyam du ste de'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa dang dus mnyam du ste de'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: the Blessed One, simultaneously with the completion, because it is a part of that.

original: der sngon gyi padmar ni snying ga'i padmar ste /
analyzed: der sngon gyi padmar ni snying ga'i padmar ste /
translated: There, in the lotus of the heart,

original: mngal @159a * //
analyzed: mngal @159a * //
translated: in the womb,

original: gyi gnas skabs su de skye ba las phyis padma gzhan rnams skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gyi gnas skabs su de skye ba las phyis padma gzhan rnams skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because after the arising of that, the other lotuses arise later.

original: 'dab mar te 'dab ma brgyad rnams so //🔽lte bar bcas ni lte ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dab mar te 'dab ma brgyad rnams so // lte bar bcas ni lte ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
translated: In the petals, in the eight petals,🔽with the navel, with the navel.

original: yi ge rnam par 'god par byed do zhes pa rnam 'god ni yid de de dgod pa'o ;
analyzed: yi ge rnam par 'god par byed do zhes pa rnam 'god ni yid de de dgod pa'o ;
translated: The mind, which is the arrangement, arranges the syllables.

original: / sgom pas yid kho na yi ge'i rnam par dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: / sgom pas yid kho na yi ge'i rnam par dgod par bya'o //
translated: By meditation, the mind alone arranges the syllables.

original: phyi rol gyi yi ge ni ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi yi ge ni ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that the external syllables are not.

original: 'di thams cad ci byas nas she na /
analyzed: 'di thams cad ci byas nas she na /
translated: What is the purpose of all this?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / dbus su dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / dbus su dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the center, the maṇḍala, and so on.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lha brgyad sems kyi dbus su bsams nas /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lha brgyad sems kyi dbus su bsams nas /
translated: Just as in the mandala of the vajra realm, the pledge beings are the eight deities such as Vairochana, who are generated in the mandala of the single stage of creation.

original: de'i dbus su ste snying gar zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar po can /
analyzed: de'i dbus su ste snying gar zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar po can /
translated: In the center of those, in the heart, is the awareness being, white, with one face and two hands.

original: gsung rdo rje nyid kyi phyir dmar ba'i mdangs can rnam shes te ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje nyid kyi phyir dmar ba'i mdangs can rnam shes te ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: Because it is the vajra speech, it has a reddish glow.

original: ye shes sems dpa' de kho na'i thugs kar ye shes te ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' h'um ngo //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' de kho na'i thugs kar ye shes te ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' h'um ngo //
translated: In the heart of that awareness being is the concentration being, the wisdom, the syllable hum.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can no zhes pa man ngag go ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can no zhes pa man ngag go ;
translated: For that reason, in the mandala of the vajra realm, the Bhagavat has the nature of the three beings.

original: / de'i shar gyi 'dab mar byams pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na sems can gyi log par sgrub pa rnams kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: / de'i shar gyi 'dab mar byams pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na sems can gyi log par sgrub pa rnams kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: On its eastern petal, Vairocana is Akṣobhya, because he is not disturbed by the perversity of sentient beings, by virtue of his nature of love.

original: de'i sa bon ni bum mo //
analyzed: de'i sa bon ni bum mo //
translated: His seed is the vase.

original: sgo zhes pa phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sgo zhes pa phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The “door” indicates the direction.

original: rin chen de nyid sa bon ni lhor rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ste a'am ngo //
analyzed: rin chen de nyid sa bon ni lhor rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ste a'am ngo //
translated: The seed of that jewel is in the south, Ratnasambhava’s, aṃ.

original: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas kyi hr'i:'o //
analyzed: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas kyi hr'i:'o //
translated: In the west, it is Amitābha’s, hrīḥ.

original: don yod gtso bo'i sems kyi sa bon ni don yod grub pa'i ste kham ngo //
analyzed: don yod gtso bo'i sems kyi sa bon ni don yod grub pa'i ste kham ngo //
translated: The seed of Amoghasiddhi’s mind is Amoghasiddhi’s, khaṃ.

original: lte ba'i padmar dbyangs kyang 'di ste aa yig go //
analyzed: lte ba'i padmar dbyangs kyang 'di ste aa yig go //
translated: The sound is also here, in the navel lotus, the letter a.

original: aa yig sogs rnams las thog ma yang yin la mchog gtso bo yang ste /
analyzed: aa yig sogs rnams las thog ma yang yin la mchog gtso bo yang ste /
translated: It is the first of the letters beginning with a, and it is the supreme, the best,

original: chos rnams thams cad aa yig gi sgo can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad aa yig gi sgo can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because all phenomena have the door of the letter a.

original: sa bon yang ste 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon yang ste 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the seed, because it produces the fruit.

original: zla ba phyed pa dang thig le ldan pa aam ngo //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa dang thig le ldan pa aam ngo //
translated: It is aṃ, endowed with the half-moon and the drop.

original: bum yig la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams ni /
analyzed: bum yig la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams ni /
translated: The letters, such as the vase letter,

original: zla ba'i 'od kyis mngon par brgyan pa rnams so //🔽@159b phyogs mtshams rnams su ni dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od kyis mngon par brgyan pa rnams so // @159b phyogs mtshams rnams su ni dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su'o //
translated: are adorned with the light of the moon.🔽In the cardinal and intermediate directions,

original: rim r'im lim l'im ma ning rnams te /
analyzed: rim r'im lim l'im ma ning rnams te /
translated: the neuter letters, ra, ri, li, la, are in Indra and so forth.

original: sngar bshad pa ni /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa ni /
translated: The previously explained

original: sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
translated: four seed syllables

original: zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: and so forth.

original: yi ge brgyad po de rnams kyi dbus su de'i ste padma'i lte ba sems kyi yi ge mi bskyod pa'i sa bon h'um ste des so //
analyzed: yi ge brgyad po de rnams kyi dbus su de'i ste padma'i lte ba sems kyi yi ge mi bskyod pa'i sa bon h'um ste des so //
translated: In the center of those eight letters, that is, in the center of the lotus, is the mind letter, the seed of Akshobhya, hum.🔽The concentration being explained previously is the seed of Akshobhya.

original: bshad zin pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' kho na mi bskyod pa'i sa bon no zhes dgongs pas nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: bshad zin pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' kho na mi bskyod pa'i sa bon no zhes dgongs pas nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: This is the intention of the summary.

original: de skad gsungs te /🔽dam tshig sems dpa' ste lte ba'i chu skyes la aam ngo //
analyzed: de skad gsungs te / dam tshig sems dpa' ste lte ba'i chu skyes la aam ngo //
translated: It is said:🔽The commitment being, that is, the am in the navel lotus.

original: snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar mtsho skyes la yang yi ge dgu rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar mtsho skyes la yang yi ge dgu rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The mind of the gnosis being, that is, the hum in the heart lotus, is meditated on the lotus in the heart.

original: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa ni stong pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kho nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o zhes rtogs par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /🔽ya mtshan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa ni stong pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kho nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o zhes rtogs par bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa / ya mtshan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the creation stage is taught for the purpose of understanding that one accomplishes perfect enlightenment by means of the nature of emptiness alone.

original: ya mtshan gyi rnam pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ya mtshan gyi rnam pa gsungs pa /
translated: The form of the marvelous is stated with “amazing,” etc.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The form of the marvelous is stated with “without characteristics,” etc.

original: sbyor ba dang pos ni dang po'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba dang pos ni dang po'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: The first application is the first application.

original: nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: And also the supreme king of mandalas, etc., because of the mere indication.

original: yi ge ni h'um la sogs pa'o //🔽stong pa 'di ni ste /
analyzed: yi ge ni h'um la sogs pa'o // stong pa 'di ni ste /
translated: The syllable is the syllable “hum,” etc.🔽This emptiness is not able to be indicated by anything at all,

original: ci ltar te rnam pa ci zhig gis kyang mtshon par mi nus na /
analyzed: ci ltar te rnam pa ci zhig gis kyang mtshon par mi nus na /
translated: by what form, or in what way.

original: de la ci zhig las de'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: de la ci zhig las de'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba 'jug pa yin /
translated: Then, what is the result of that?

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: The vajra is the vajra essence.

original: mtshon bya ni gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: mtshon bya ni gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar ro //
translated: The object of indication is form up to consciousness.

original: mtshan nyid ni gzugs su yod pa nas rang gsal ba'i bar te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni gzugs su yod pa nas rang gsal ba'i bar te /
translated: The characteristics are from the existence of form up to self-clarity.

original: de dag la snying po nyid du sgro btags pa dag gi stong pa nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de dag la snying po nyid du sgro btags pa dag gi stong pa nyid ni phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of those which are exaggerated as the essence is the non-erroneous reality.

original: gzhan ni phyin ci log pa las de kho na nyid du snying por sgro 'dogs so //
analyzed: gzhan ni phyin ci log pa las de kho na nyid du snying por sgro 'dogs so //
translated: The other is the exaggeration of the essence as reality from error.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar snying po med pa'i chu shing las snying po bdud rtsi lta bu'i 'bras bu yin pa de ltar snying po med pa'i kun rdzob pa dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa spros pa med pa nyid du bsgom bzhin pa'i snying🔽po spros pa med pa'i bdud rtsi srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ye shes sku @160a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar snying po med pa'i chu shing las snying po bdud rtsi lta bu'i 'bras bu yin pa de ltar snying po med pa'i kun rdzob pa dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa spros pa med pa nyid du bsgom bzhin pa'i snying po spros pa med pa'i bdud rtsi srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ye shes sku @160a * //
translated: Therefore, just as from the pithless plantain the fruit is like the essence of nectar, so from the pithless conventional, the first application, and so on, the stage of generation is meditated on as the essence of the nectar of non-elaboration.

original: 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ste /
translated: The essence of that meditation is the non-abiding nirvāṇa, the gnosis body, the result.

original: chu shing ni chu shing ngo //
analyzed: chu shing ni chu shing ngo //
translated: The plantain is the plantain.

original: 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The fruit is its fruit.

original: ci ltar rab tu gsal ba yang mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rab tu gsal ba yang mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How is the very clear also a characteristic?

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pas na rnam shes dang 'dis shes par bya ba'o zhes pas ye shes te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pas na rnam shes dang 'dis shes par bya ba'o zhes pas ye shes te /
translated: Because of consciousness, it is consciousness, and because of this, it is knowledge.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de dag gi dbus su gzugs med ye shes gzugs su ste /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de dag gi dbus su gzugs med ye shes gzugs su ste /
translated: In the middle of those two, the apprehended and the apprehender, there is the form of knowledge that is formless.

original: yod pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor rang nyid rab tu gsal ba nyid kho nar mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas mtshon par bya rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor rang nyid rab tu gsal ba nyid kho nar mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas mtshon par bya rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It is to be indicated by direct perception or inference, to be understood, as just the very clear itself, in the nature of the non-existent apprehended and apprehender.

original: so so skye bos ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin kho nar mtshon par bya ste /
analyzed: so so skye bos ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin kho nar mtshon par bya ste /
translated: Ordinary beings indicate it as just the nature of the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni ye shes sku //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni ye shes sku //
translated: The yogi/nī indicates it as the gnosis body.

original: zhes pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po dbyer med pa spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyang ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa'i rten yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po dbyer med pa spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyang ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa'i rten yang ngo //
translated: The gnosis body is the dharmakāya, and it is also the non-conceptual gnosis of the inseparability of emptiness and great compassion, and it is also the support of the saṃbhogakāya and so forth.

original: ye shes sku ni chos kyi sku ste /
analyzed: ye shes sku ni chos kyi sku ste /
translated: The gnosis body is the dharmakāya.

original: de nyid 'bras bu'i zhes khyad par can skabs las thob pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'bras bu'i zhes khyad par can skabs las thob pa'o //
translated: That itself is the special result, obtained from the context.

original: sgro btags pa'i bag chags ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i bag chags ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: It is immovable because it is free from all the latent predispositions of superimposition.

original: gang las dngos po ste rang rig pa'am gzhan don dam par yod pa nyid dang / dngos med de med pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang las dngos po ste rang rig pa'am gzhan don dam par yod pa nyid dang / dngos med de med pa nyid de /
translated: From which, the thing, that is, the self-awareness or the ultimate existence of the other, and the non-thing, that is, the non-existence of that,

original: de dag las rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: de dag las rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: it is liberated.

original: kha dog gzugs ni kha dog med ;
analyzed: kha dog gzugs ni kha dog med ;
translated: Color-form is not color.

original: ces pa la /
analyzed: ces pa la /
translated: As for that,

original: kha dog ni sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba nyid du mngon par zhen pa ste /
analyzed: kha dog ni sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba nyid du mngon par zhen pa ste /
translated: color is the manifest clinging to blue, etc. as the object.

original: kha dog med pa ni bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa nyid du ste /
analyzed: kha dog med pa ni bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa nyid du ste /
translated: Colorless is the manifest clinging to pleasure, etc. as the subject.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid du med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid du med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist as their essence.

original: de'i ngo bo ma yin pa ni shin tu dngos po dngos med pa dag go //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ma yin pa ni shin tu dngos po dngos med pa dag go //
translated: Not their essence is the complete non-existence of things and non-things.

original: de las dbus ni gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dag gi ste /
analyzed: de las dbus ni gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dag gi ste /
translated: From that, the middle is that of the object and subject,

original: tha mi dad pa'am /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'am /
translated: not different.

original: tha dad pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo stong pa kho nar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo stong pa kho nar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The yogi/nī of reality should apprehend the emptiness of the nature of things and non-things as distinct.

original: ji ltar 'di dang tshu rol mthong bas mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa dang rjes su dpag pa yang mi srid pa dang / stong pa nyid du yid ches pas srid pa de ltar rgyas pa dang bcas par kho bo cag gis gzhung du phye bar zin to //
analyzed: ji ltar 'di dang tshu rol mthong bas mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa dang rjes su dpag pa yang mi srid pa dang / stong pa nyid du yid ches pas srid pa de ltar rgyas pa dang bcas par kho bo cag gis gzhung du phye bar zin to //
translated: Just as this and the other world are apprehended by the characteristics, etc. of those who see only this side, and just as inference is not possible, and just as it is possible by confidence in emptiness, so we have analyzed the text with its elaboration.

original: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang gi ngo bo phyin ci ma log par shes nas bskyed pa'i rim pa mnyam pa nyid kyi @160b ye shes kyis dang snyig rje chen po'i sems kyis kyang yongs su sbyangs pa goms par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang gi ngo bo phyin ci ma log par shes nas bskyed pa'i rim pa mnyam pa nyid kyi @160b ye shes kyis dang snyig rje chen po'i sems kyis kyang yongs su sbyangs pa goms par bya'o //
translated: Thus, having understood the nature of the conventional and the ultimate without error, one should cultivate the stage of generation by the wisdom of equality and by the mind of great compassion.

original: de ltar na de ni de bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam gyi 'bras bu yun mi ring ba nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na de ni de bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam gyi 'bras bu yun mi ring ba nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the result of the stage of generation of that [mind of enlightenment] will be seen in no long time, by the path of perfect enlightenment.

original: de ci ltar 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i shin tu sbas pa'i don can gyi ngag rnams kyis rtogs par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci ltar 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i shin tu sbas pa'i don can gyi ngag rnams kyis rtogs par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is this to be understood through these statements that have such a hidden meaning?🔽It is said:

original: bla ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The path of the guru's instruction,🔽the treatise that teaches the two truths,🔽the meaning of the tantra, and the nature of wisdom and consciousness.

original: bla ma ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: bla ma ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The guru is the Bhagavān Vajradhara.

original: des nye bar gnang ba'i lam shes su 'jug pa las gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: des nye bar gnang ba'i lam shes su 'jug pa las gzhan yang ngo //
translated: The path is the means of understanding that is given by him.

original: de'i man ngag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba ston pa ste /
analyzed: de'i man ngag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba ston pa ste /
translated: His instruction is the teaching of reality just as it is.

original: lam ni rtogs pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: lam ni rtogs pa'i thabs so //
translated: The path is the means of understanding.

original: bstan bcos ni gsung rab ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos ni gsung rab ste /
translated: The treatise is the scriptures.

original: mdor ston par byed do zhes pas mdor ston tsam mo //
analyzed: mdor ston par byed do zhes pas mdor ston tsam mo //
translated: It is said that it is taught in brief, but it is only a brief introduction.

original: mdor bstan par bya ba ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mdor bstan par bya ba ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: What is to be taught in brief is the definition.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: The essence is thatness.

original: ye shes ni de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa can la /
analyzed: ye shes ni de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa can la /
translated: Wisdom is the aspect of thatness.

original: rnam shes ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa can te /
analyzed: rnam shes ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa can te /
translated: Consciousness is the aspect of the conventional.

original: de'i ngo bo las so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo las so //
translated: It arises from that essence.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid de rnams kyang dpa' ba ste bla mas gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid de rnams kyang dpa' ba ste bla mas gsal bar byed de /
translated: Those thatnesses of the two truths are also clarified by the guru, the hero.

original: so so skye bos kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: so so skye bos kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: The individual, the ordinary person, also.

original: zhar la 'ongs pa'i de ma thag tu dkyus ma rjes su sbrel ba ni 'di'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhar la 'ongs pa'i de ma thag tu dkyus ma rjes su sbrel ba ni 'di'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The main point, which was interrupted by the digression, is resumed with this, etc.

original: kun gyi bsgom byas pa ni rnal 'byor pas te /
analyzed: kun gyi bsgom byas pa ni rnal 'byor pas te /
translated: The cultivation of all is by the yogi.

original: mngal du dang por lnga ste lag pa dang rkang pa dang mgo bo 'bur ba dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: mngal du dang por lnga ste lag pa dang rkang pa dang mgo bo 'bur ba dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: In the womb, first there are five, namely, the hands, feet, and head, which are protruding.

original: mchod rten ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams te /
analyzed: mchod rten ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams te /
translated: The relic is the aggregates of form, etc.

original: de rnams sems par byed pa ni rtas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams sems par byed pa ni rtas par byed pa'o //
translated: The contemplation of those is the nourishment.

original: bdud rtsi ni khu ba ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni khu ba ste /
translated: The nectar is the semen.

original: de nyid sa bon te bskyed pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de nyid sa bon te bskyed pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: That itself is the seed, because it is generated.

original: / aom ha yig kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la bdud rtsi'i sa bon no //
analyzed: / aom ha yig kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la bdud rtsi'i sa bon no //
translated: The syllable om ha is also the seed of nectar in the creation stage.

original: de la 'od zer dkar po can bzang po ste bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kha dog dkar po'i 'od can khu ba'i rgyun gyi ngo bo 'dzag cing /
analyzed: de la 'od zer dkar po can bzang po ste bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kha dog dkar po'i 'od can khu ba'i rgyun gyi ngo bo 'dzag cing /
translated: There, the excellent one, which has white light, is the nature of great bliss, having the color of white light, dripping with the essence of the stream of semen.

original: snying ga'i sa bon gyi chu skyes la ni lte bar mthe bong gi tshad tsam gyi zlum po zla ba'i gzugs te /
analyzed: snying ga'i sa bon gyi chu skyes la ni lte bar mthe bong gi tshad tsam gyi zlum po zla ba'i gzugs te /
translated: On the lotus of the seed syllable at the heart, there is a moon mandala at the navel, the size of a thumb, the form of the moon.

original: de la sa bon a'a li k'a li dag las phyung ba'i h'um nag po'o //🔽de ltar tshim par byed pa gsungs nas thig le'i rnal 'byor gsung ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la sa bon a'a li k'a li dag las phyung ba'i h'um nag po'o // de ltar tshim par byed pa gsungs nas thig le'i rnal 'byor gsung ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: On that, there is a black hūṃ, extracted from the a-li-ka-li seed syllables.

original: dkar po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkar po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having explained the process of satisfaction, in order to explain the bindu yoga, he says, “white light rays,” and so on.

original: h'um yig de'i 'od zer dkar po zla 'od lta bu rnams gyen du mgo bo'i @161a * //🔽mtsho skyes la brten te /
analyzed: h'um yig de'i 'od zer dkar po zla 'od lta bu rnams gyen du mgo bo'i @161a * // mtsho skyes la brten te /
translated: White light rays from that hūṃ syllable, like moonlight, ascend through the central nāḍī.

original: mgo bo'i chu skyes de'i sgo rtsa'i bu ga rnams kyi dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i'i bug par rab tu bsgrags pa'i gang thig le'i sems byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le ste /
analyzed: mgo bo'i chu skyes de'i sgo rtsa'i bu ga rnams kyi dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i'i bug par rab tu bsgrags pa'i gang thig le'i sems byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le ste /
translated: The bindu of bodhicitta, the mind of the bindu, is in the center of the nāḍī openings of the lotus of the head.

original: de dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam nas 'ongs shing /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam nas 'ongs shing /
translated: Having become one with that, it comes through the path of the central nāḍī.

original: snying gar h'um gi thig le la de'i bdag nyid du skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha shas bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi ngo bor yang dag gnas /
analyzed: snying gar h'um gi thig le la de'i bdag nyid du skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha shas bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi ngo bor yang dag gnas /
translated: At the heart, in the bindu of hūṃ, it is perfectly present in the nature of a subtle particle, like a part that is divided one hundred times.🔽That white subtle particle is also the nature of the signifier and the signified,

original: rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo dkar po de yang mtshon bya mtshan nyid ye shes can rnams dbyer med pas na /
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo dkar po de yang mtshon bya mtshan nyid ye shes can rnams dbyer med pas na /
translated: which are inseparable.

original: spros pa dang rnam par bral ba'i shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: spros pa dang rnam par bral ba'i shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the nature of the mind free from proliferation and free from conceptuality is the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: der ltos shig ste /
analyzed: der ltos shig ste /
translated: Look at that!

original: nges par dpyad nas mngon sum du gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: nges par dpyad nas mngon sum du gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Analyze it and make it manifest.

original: mtshon par bya ba'am mtshan nyid kyang ci zhe na /
analyzed: mtshon par bya ba'am mtshan nyid kyang ci zhe na /
translated: What is the signified or the characteristic?

original: thig le'i go 'phang gnas te thig le kho na mtshan nyid kyi rten mtshon par bya ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thig le'i go 'phang gnas te thig le kho na mtshan nyid kyi rten mtshon par bya ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The state of the bindu is the basis of the characteristic, the signified.

original: shes med sems kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes med sems kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the mind is nonknowing.

original: shes pa gzung bar bya ba'i dngos pa dang dngos po med pa dag dang / de'i 'dzin pa yang med pa ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes pa gzung bar bya ba'i dngos pa dang dngos po med pa dag dang / de'i 'dzin pa yang med pa ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic is the non-existence of the object of apprehension, which is an entity or a non-entity, and the non-existence of its apprehension.

original: ci zhig tu zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig tu zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: snying gar ro //
analyzed: snying gar ro //
translated: In the heart.

original: ci zhig gis 'ongs nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig gis 'ongs nas she na /
translated: By what does it come?

original: gser gyi sgo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i rlabs rtsa dang 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir na gang thig le'i sgo ni mdzod spu'i sgo ste /
analyzed: gser gyi sgo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i rlabs rtsa dang 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir na gang thig le'i sgo ni mdzod spu'i sgo ste /
translated: By the wave of the nectar of the moon of the golden door, which is connected with the nāḍī. The door of the bindu is the door of the ūrṇā.

original: de'i lam las ni 'og gi mtha'i lam gyis aa wa dh'u t'i'i bu gas so zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i lam las ni 'og gi mtha'i lam gyis aa wa dh'u t'i'i bu gas so zhes pa'i don to //
translated: By the path of that, by the path of the lower end, the avadhūti is split. This is the meaning.

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'di yang bla ma'i bstan pas dbye bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'di yang bla ma'i bstan pas dbye bar bya ste /
translated: This vajra statement should be opened by the teaching of the guru.

original: gzung bya gzung bar 'os pa la rnam shes ye shes dag ni las la ste /
analyzed: gzung bya gzung bar 'os pa la rnam shes ye shes dag ni las la ste /
translated: The object of apprehension, which is suitable to be apprehended, is for the consciousness and the wisdoms, which are the actions.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag go //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag go //
translated: They are the conventional and the ultimate.

original: gang gi phyir bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtogs pa can gyi lam las sam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtogs pa can gyi lam las sam /
translated: Because of that, the one who has realization of the nature of the two truths, by the path of the one who has realization, or

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs pa dang ldan pa las bstan pa lhur len pa de yin gyi /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs pa dang ldan pa las bstan pa lhur len pa de yin gyi /
translated: It is from one who has realized the meaning of the treatise as it is in reality that there is the teaching of the essence of the path.

original: lam dang bstan bcos las phyi rol pa ring ba las te phyin ci log gi don ston pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lam dang bstan bcos las phyi rol pa ring ba las te phyin ci log gi don ston pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not from one who is far away, who is outside the path and the treatise, who teaches a meaning that is contrary.

original: de ltar na 'di las bsgrub par bya ba la sgrub pa snying por byed pas 'byung bar bya dgos so zhes dgongs pa dang ldan pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar na 'di las bsgrub par bya ba la sgrub pa snying por byed pas 'byung bar bya dgos so zhes dgongs pa dang ldan pas gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is with the intention that what is to be accomplished here must be accomplished by making the essence of the path the basis that the root text says:

original: rnyed par sla zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed par sla zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Easy to find is the one who says…”

original: de'i phyir dang @161b por sbyor bar 'dod pa bla ma yongs su mnyes pa'i thabs kyi bsnyen bkur gyis rnal 'byor gyi rab tu sbyor ba lhur len pa'i slob ma la /
analyzed: de'i phyir dang @161b por sbyor bar 'dod pa bla ma yongs su mnyes pa'i thabs kyi bsnyen bkur gyis rnal 'byor gyi rab tu sbyor ba lhur len pa'i slob ma la /
translated: Therefore, the disciple who wishes to engage in the practice of yoga, by the means of service that pleases the guru,

original: bla ma mkhas pas ji ltar 'os par bden pa gnyis dang rim pa gnyis rtogs par bya ba'i ched du mkhas pas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma mkhas pas ji ltar 'os par bden pa gnyis dang rim pa gnyis rtogs par bya ba'i ched du mkhas pas bstan par bya'o //
translated: the wise guru should teach the wise disciple, as is appropriate, in order to realize the two truths and the two stages.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: It is in meditative equipoise.

original: mnyam par te srid pa dang / zhi ba dag ro gcig pa'i rang gi ngo bo la gzhag pa ste de'i rang bzhin bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa shes rab dang snying rje yongs su 'brel pa'i yid can no //
analyzed: mnyam par te srid pa dang / zhi ba dag ro gcig pa'i rang gi ngo bo la gzhag pa ste de'i rang bzhin bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa shes rab dang snying rje yongs su 'brel pa'i yid can no //
translated: He is established in equality, that is, in the nature of the single taste of existence and peace. He is the one whose mind is fully engaged in wisdom and compassion, the nature of the two truths, which are not dual.

original: mi g-yo ba ni the tshom gyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ni the tshom gyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is unshakable because he is unshaken by doubt.

original: nyer 'tshe med pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyer 'tshe med pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He is harmless because he has eliminated the harm of attachment and so on.

original: ci zhig las she na /
analyzed: ci zhig las she na /
translated: From what?

original: yid kho na 'di lta bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kho na 'di lta bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: From the mind alone, and not from anything else.

original: dngos po 'byung bas te rgyu yis so //
analyzed: dngos po 'byung bas te rgyu yis so //
translated: By the occurrence of things, that is, by causes.

original: 'byung bas na dngos po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'byung bas na dngos po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Things are the aggregates of form and so on.

original: dag pa rnams kyang de rnams kyi 'byung ba ste 'byung byed kyi skyed par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: dag pa rnams kyang de rnams kyi 'byung ba ste 'byung byed kyi skyed par byed pa nyid do //
translated: Their occurrence is their production, their generation.

original: gang gi phyir yid nyon mongs pa dang las kyi bdag nyid ni rgyu nyid kyi phyir sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnams 'khor ba can gyi phung po rnams so //🔽'di kho nas dag pa ni yid kyis dag pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yid nyon mongs pa dang las kyi bdag nyid ni rgyu nyid kyi phyir sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnams 'khor ba can gyi phung po rnams so // 'di kho nas dag pa ni yid kyis dag pa ste /
translated: Because the mind is the cause of the defilements and karma, the aggregates of one who is subject to transmigration are preceded by the dharmas.

original: yid dag pa rnams kyis de rnams dag pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid dag pa rnams kyis de rnams dag pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is purified by this alone, i.e. by the mind, because the mind is purified by those who are purified.

original: dag pa ni sgrib pa thams cad 'gog pa'o //🔽yid kho nas mgyogs pa rnams ni shugs dang ldan pa rnams te /
analyzed: dag pa ni sgrib pa thams cad 'gog pa'o // yid kho nas mgyogs pa rnams ni shugs dang ldan pa rnams te /
translated: Purification is the cessation of all obscuration.

original: thabs kyi khyad par gyi shugs dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sbyor ba kho na las tshul gzhan pas myur bar dag pa thob pas na mgyogs pa'i lam yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs kyi khyad par gyi shugs dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sbyor ba kho na las tshul gzhan pas myur bar dag pa thob pas na mgyogs pa'i lam yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The mind alone is swift, i.e. endowed with momentum, because the attainment of purification is swift by means of the mind alone, which is endowed with momentum due to the special method, and not by any other means.

original: 'dis ni bden pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can ni yid kho na ste gtso bo nyid las so zhes gsungs shing /
analyzed: 'dis ni bden pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can ni yid kho na ste gtso bo nyid las so zhes gsungs shing /
translated: This is what is being said: the mind alone is the essence of the four noble truths because it is the principal factor.

original: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i ngo bo yang ngo //
analyzed: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i ngo bo yang ngo //
translated: And it is the essence of the perfection of one's own and others' goals.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: yid kyis shes pa yid kyi'o //
analyzed: yid kyis shes pa yid kyi'o //
translated: The mental one is mental.

original: rgyal po ni rgyal po'i'o //
analyzed: rgyal po ni rgyal po'i'o //
translated: The king is the king's.

original: dang bas te /
analyzed: dang bas te /
translated: It is pure,

original: phrag dog la sogs pa'i dri ma'i rnyog pa bkrus pa nyid kyis na rab tu dang ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: phrag dog la sogs pa'i dri ma'i rnyog pa bkrus pa nyid kyis na rab tu dang ba nyid kyis so //
translated: because it is purified by the stain of jealousy, etc.

original: gzhan gyi don ni chos gsung ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don ni chos gsung ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The benefit of others is the performance of the Dharma, the performance of miracles, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir @162a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir @162a * //
translated: For that very reason,

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid na yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang nyid kyis skye dgu smin par byed pa'i phyir 'di'i rgyal po nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid na yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang nyid kyis skye dgu smin par byed pa'i phyir 'di'i rgyal po nyid de /
translated: even when there is no conceptualization, by the power of former vows, it is the king of the maturation of beings.

original: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: This is the nature of the Tathagata.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo'i yang rnam par rtog pa can nyid na yang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo'i yang rnam par rtog pa can nyid na yang ngo //
translated: When there is conceptualization, it is the nature of the Bodhisattva.

original: so so skye bo'i bdag nyid kyi ni ji ltar rigs pa kho na ste /
analyzed: so so skye bo'i bdag nyid kyi ni ji ltar rigs pa kho na ste /
translated: When it is the nature of an ordinary person, it is just as appropriate.

original: rnam pa gzhan du yang ngag dang lus kyi las dag go //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du yang ngag dang lus kyi las dag go //
translated: In other ways also, there is the action of speech and body.

original: gang gi phyir yang de ltar thams cad du yid gtso bo yin pa de'i phyir yid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'bad rtsol rnams kyis thos pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi yid las byung bsgom pa'i blo ldan du gyur pa ni gal te de la mnyam par gzhag
analyzed: gang gi phyir yang de ltar thams cad du yid gtso bo yin pa de'i phyir yid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'bad rtsol rnams kyis thos pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi yid las byung bsgom pa'i blo ldan du gyur pa ni gal te de la mnyam par gzhag
translated: Since the mind is primary in all these ways, those who are diligent in the nature of the mind, who have the intelligence of meditation that arises from listening and reflection, will, if they rest in meditative equipoise,🔽

original: pa'i yid lhag par rtogs par 'dod na de'i tshe bzlas bya goms par bya ste sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi yid kyis so //
analyzed: pa'i yid lhag par rtogs par 'dod na de'i tshe bzlas bya goms par bya ste sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi yid kyis so //
translated: Since the mind is the chief of all, therefore, by the efforts of the nature of the mind, the wise one who has the nature of hearing and reflection, if he wishes to realize the mind of meditative equipoise, then at that time he should practice the recitation with the mind of the nature of meditation.

original: ci zhe na sems pa ste rtas par byed pa dang / bde mchog ste sham bde ba 'dam par byed pa ni g-yeng ba thams cad zad par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa bde mchog thig le'o //
analyzed: ci zhe na sems pa ste rtas par byed pa dang / bde mchog ste sham bde ba 'dam par byed pa ni g-yeng ba thams cad zad par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa bde mchog thig le'o //
translated: What is that? The mind that is the cause of the supreme bliss, which is the cause of the supreme bliss, is the bindu of supreme bliss, because it causes the exhaustion of all distractions.

original: 'on kyang rgyu sgom pa'i dbang dang 'bras bu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyi dang yang dag pa'i sa bon thig le bsgom par bya ba'i yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu sgom pa'i dbang dang 'bras bu mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyi dang yang dag pa'i sa bon thig le bsgom par bya ba'i yin gyi /
translated: However, the cause is the meditation of the seed of the bindu of the mind of meditative equipoise.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor nges mi dpyod pa las ni min zhing /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor nges mi dpyod pa las ni min zhing /
translated: It is not from not analyzing the nature of the absence of intrinsic reality.

original: kun rdzob pa'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po la sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid rnams su ste don dam pa pa rnams su lta ba sgro btags pa las 'di'i goms pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po la sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid rnams su ste don dam pa pa rnams su lta ba sgro btags pa las 'di'i goms pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin no //
translated: This is because the cultivation of this view, which is the superimposition of the things of the relative, such as effects and causes, as the realities, that is, the ultimate realities, is not fruitful.

original: bzlog pa kho na las de kho na nyid 'di rnams so zhes dbu ma'i snye mar nges par dpyad zin to //
analyzed: bzlog pa kho na las de kho na nyid 'di rnams so zhes dbu ma'i snye mar nges par dpyad zin to //
translated: It is only the opposite of that which is these realities. This has been analyzed and ascertained in the Garland of the Middle Way.

original: thig le'i rnal 'byor gzhan dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor gsal bar bya ba'i ched du yang dag pa'i sa bon nyid rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: thig le'i rnal 'byor gzhan dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor gsal bar bya ba'i ched du yang dag pa'i sa bon nyid rtogs par byed de /
translated: In order to clarify the other yoga of the bindu and the yoga of the subtle, the correct seed itself is realized.

original: gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The verse beginning with “form” and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams srid pa 'khor ba ste de'i longs spyod ni gtso bor na reg bya'i bde ba'i ro myong ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams srid pa 'khor ba ste de'i longs spyod ni gtso bor na reg bya'i bde ba'i ro myong ba'o //
translated: Form and so on are existence, that is, samsara. The enjoyment of that is primarily the experience of the taste of the bliss of contact.

original: de'i dmigs pa sa bon lnga po ni 'di'i cha shas lnga rnams so zhes pa lnga pa ste sa bon rnams kyi tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dmigs pa sa bon lnga po ni 'di'i cha shas lnga rnams so zhes pa lnga pa ste sa bon rnams kyi tshogs pa'o //
translated: The five seeds are the five parts of this.

original: de rnams kyang rgyu dang rkyen rnams las @162b 'byung ba'i sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams te lnga'o //
